content.detailedDescription: I had an amazing sighting this morning on my way north toward yuba city. i was just south of lincoln... i saw 12-15 shiny objects in the sky. i was on my motorcycle so i could not pay 100 % attention right away. i saw a "cluster" of objects... my mind said balloons at first... i glanced between the sky and the road in front of me several times... the objects moved from a "cluster" to a "wedge or v" shape in what seemed to be 2-3 seconds. i took the next right off the highway road to find myself in an empty parking lot between two short buildings... the lot was completely vacant. the group of objects moved slowly north by north east. i watched them travel for about a minute and then all but one of the objects vanished instantly. the one remaining object moved back in a south by south west direction and stopped nearly directly over my head. it hung above me, for two or three minutes before moving back in the north by north east direction where another object moved in from a right angle to fly beside it. i lost sight of both objects after 2 to 3 minutes. i tried to get my wife on the phone while this was all happening but ended up leaving a very excited detailed message in her voice mail box. i had my camera with me but failed epically to get any video or pictures because i didn't check all the pockets of my back pack and consequently convinced myself that i had left it at home... i guess i was too distracted, i had the camera all along. epic failure... but what a sighting. i hadn't seen anything since 1993 and now i've had two sightings this year... this one was pretty epic... it reminded me greatly of the "cluster" videos taken in mexico... the fact that they moved into a formation was amazing to me. i saw two large birds in the vicinity, one jet airliner, one smaller plane, and the moon was over my left shoulder during this event. from my perspective the unidentified objects seemed to be higher than any of the other flying things i witnessed.
content.summary: Cluster of objects moving north east

content.detailedDescription:
So first we got bored at my friend dakotas house, (close to the highschool) and we went up to it through the mini wood trail and up into the field, and then climbed a tree as it was slowly getting darker, i was in a higher up tree so i sorta got stuck for a bit cause by the time i was getting down the first stars were starting to appear. when i finally got down it was dark enough to see some stars, and we were kinda just chillin. then we were joking around about aliens and stuff and how it was all sketch cause we were out in the middle of a field right as it began to get dark. the field was big enough that most of the light pollution  couldnt ruin our view of the stars; we saw a plane and i was joking and said "dude look, its an alien!" and it was just a plane, but then we started joking around some more and watching planes, we kinda spooked ourselves out a bit. right as we were about to leave we saw a much brighter, larger plane, even from far away. right before this happened i remember out of the corner of my eye i saw tworeally pale pinkish white flashes in the speed of a fast camera. it didnt seem like a plane as it did more like a star. it seemed to come towards us and slowly get lower; then we realized it was in our general direction but somewhat more towards the downtown bay area. then it was in an angle where we could see three lights, bunched together closely, seeming like it was one large object (rather than several) with apparently a small red light on the top, (i didnt see it though, but apparently dakota did.) i tried taking a picture with my phone, hoping it might look good, but i knew it wouldnt, and didnt. by then we could tell the object was very large, and it started slowing down, almost humorously as i tried to take a picture. but as i tried again it started speeding up, and towards the direction we couldnt see because the highschools gym building was in the way. so i stopped trying to take a photo and we ran out towards the other side of the field to keep it in view, of course as this happened it slowly sped up more and more. to fast to be a jet, but slow enough to see its general shape. by then even as we ran out to keep seeing it, it went over the forest line (an area between us and the bay unless you take the town route) and then we couldnt see it anymore. as all of it was happening i wasnt at all afraid, only interested, and i had some adrenaline pumping when i realized it was definitely not, a plane. 
now were going to buy a pizza, with nothing else to do, and go back up to the field hoping to see more. :)
content.summary: Cirular triangle, out in sehome football feild, small light, got bigger, then shape was visible, slowed down spead up, out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
A couple of days ago, i filled out a report of two high flying ufo's that nearly collided. i never thought i would be doing this again. i will never ever forget what i saw yesterday. it has haunted me with questions all day today. approx 6 pm yesterday 5/06/2010, i heard a massive airline leave our small airport. i looked up to see a air-bus with a tan front end and a wierd tail on it. this huge plane was coming out of our municiple airport which is only used for small aircraft. i turned toward my front door while looking up. and to the east approx 1500 ft above my home was a cigar shaped ufo floating by between 60 and 70 mph. it obviously was watching and following this air-bus. i thought camera and ran to the door but the door was locked accidently by my 10 year old grandaughter. i yelled and beat on the door and my wife and grandaughter came blasting out to see what was wrong. i pointed at the craft and said look no wings! no sound! ( you could still hear the sound of the air-bus though) i knew i did not have time to take a picture so i grabbed my rifle scope and tried to see it. if you have ever tried to do that, its near to impossible! my wife and grandaughter which did not believe in ufo's now had substantial proof. the ufo was approx 60ft to 70 ft long, 8 to 10 ft high and approx 15ft wide, moving at a speed of which any of our aircraft would fall out of the sky. it was metallic gray, glistened in the setting sun as it drifted upward keeping a level profile. from the side appearance, it looked like a disc because of the abrupt downward slope at each end of the craft. i watched as the air-bus made a slight left turn into the clouds and the ufo angled in that direction then vanished. but right before it vanished, i got a glimpse of the rear of the craft and it appeared to have an almost octagon shape ( a wide octagon with rounded points) this i cannot say for sure as it was a ways away. it seemed either to be half cloaked or the energy from it made it seem a bit hazy. the following is the records from the airport. it does not show a large airplane leaving our airport! we live in rogers arkansas which is a very small town and also the near home of walmart. i am positive that the ufo was with this airbus ( maybe aiding it up out of the small airport or ?. departures: rogers muni-carter field airport (rogers, ar) [krog]

arrival time arrival

i am a very honest person, and all of this is true. my grandaughter even picked up a small pipe i had on the table and said "this is what it looked like grandpa. i have attached a drawing of what we have seen and i feel this could be investigated because their are leads. the air-bus! please feel free to contact me.
content.summary: Multiple witness close up account of cigar shaped ufo ( within 1500 ft)

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from seabrook nh to hampton on the coast at 9:30 after getting pizza with a friend when something in the sky caught my eye. i pulled over and observed until it disappeared. i saw a larger than star orange/red glow slowly move across the sky directly over seabrook nuclear power plant and few minutes before it disappeared a ring like saturn's appeared around it. it did not disappear in cloud but when straight up in the air till it disappeared in the abyss.
content.summary: Orange/red glowing sphere with saturn like ring around it.

content.detailedDescription:
My fiancee and i were sitting on our front porch enjoying our swing. i stretched my arms over my head as i looked up. i noticed the big dipper and an object came into my view covering the big dipper. i shouted at my fiancee to look up. we saw an object moving at a fast rate of speed and move out of our line of sight over the distant tree line.

the object was triangular shaped and dimly glowing a rusty-red color. as a combat engineering officer, i have been trained to estimate size, distance and altitude of a wide variety of objects. i would say the object was anywhere from 100 ft to 1000 ft long depending on altitude. i had no reference point to estimate altitude. 

the object flew straight over our heads not making any sounds we could hear disappearing from view over a distant tree line. the time from first sighting to losing sight was about nine seconds.

this statement is true and correct to the best of my abilities.

terry walley

witness: angel letbetter
content.summary: Object flew over my fiancee and my head.

content.detailedDescription: When outside to let my dog in looked up and saw 2 orbs passing over from north to south at very high alt, both started to flash a bright white light then did s-turns till i lost sight when the passed below the horizon
content.summary: 2 orbs at high alt doing s-turns and flashing a blight white light.

content.detailedDescription: Early in june of 1974 on a sunday evening approximately 6 pm my mother sent me to the corner store for something, as i was driving back i saw a silver disc high in the sky with the sun refelecting on it.  i kept my eyes on it as i slowly weaved down the road the 50 or 60 yards to our driveway and pulled in.  the disc was desending and getting closer and closer to me.  i jumped out of the car yelling repeatedly for my mother and father to get the camera.  mom heard me yelling and came running out of the house with flour dough covering her hands (she was making biscuts).  when she saw it she began shouting for dad to come out.  however, he was watching the news and didn't hear us.  by now the disc was silently hovering about 25 to 35 feet above us.  it had green and blue lights flashing on and off around a white center underneath it.  on the upper part it had circular windows.  after approximately three minutes it silently shot off in a southwesterly direction and disappeared in a matter of seconds.  we were shocked and in awe of what we had just witnessed.  of course we told dad immediately and just about everyone we knew.  then on that friday night dad who normally worked the day shift was filling in for a co-worker on the nightshift so mom and i were home alone.  it was the middle of the night and we were asleep in our beds when i was awakened by a brilliant blue white light that filled my bedroom.  it was as if my window had no curtains.  although i was frightened, i believe i could not move.  then the light began to shift and now it was shining through the front door.  my bedroom had two doors, one opened into the livingroom and the other into the hallway, both doors were open.  as soon as that light was off me i jumped out of bed and ran down the hall to mom and dad's bedroom.  their bedroom also has two doors, one opens to the hall and the other to the kitchen, both doors were open. mom was instantly awakened by me and the brilliant blue white light.  we were very frightened so i got dad's loaded rifle from under their bed.  we huddled together on the bed as we watched the shadows shift as the light now was slowly coming through the side windows.  from the livingroom then through the diningroom windows and then the kitchen.  with the gun cocked and pointed toward the backdoor, i said to mom that if someone comes through that door i was going to shoot them.  then the light went out and we were in the dark.  we were afraid to move for sometime, finally we got our nerves up to peak out the windows and didn't see or hear anything.  we called dad and told him and wondered if we should call the police but he said why bother since nothing had happened.  this episode lasted approximately 15 to 20 minutes.  mom and i know the light definitely had something to do with our ufo sighting.
content.summary: In june of 1974 around 6pm a silver disc hovered above me and my mother for approximately 5 mins. then 6 days later in the middle of the night we were awakened by a blinding blue white light.

content.detailedDescription:
This is the last of the 4 pictures.
i have sed 3 before
content.summary: Light blue object in  a clear sky

content.detailedDescription: Was on vaccation with my husband, daughter, son-in-law and their one year old daughter, my grandaughter. my daughter, husband and grandaughter had gone to bed.  my son-in-law ("m") and i were setting on the porch which was on second floor.  the porch faced an empty lot and in front of that was a small street.  on the other side of the street was a house with the back yard being the beach.  all at once a round light appeared.  it looked like about the size and color of a headlight of a car.  it looked like it was out over the beach about maybe about 100 yards.  i ask "m", what the heck is that.  we both just stared and kept saying what is that.  i stood up with hand on the railing and the light disappeared.  light stayed on maybe 30 seconds.  i leaned on the railing and about 3 to 5 seconds after the light went out i heard what sounded like a rumble of distant thunder to my left.  sounded like it was maybe a mile away.  of course we kept saying, what could of that been.  about 5 minutes later it appeared again in the same place.  this time we both stood up and kept saying, "is this a ufo".  i started getting nervous. it stayed on about the same length of time.  this time when it disappeared i heard the thunder sound to my right. couldn't see any shapes, just the one light.  michale wanted to go up on the beach house roof because it had one of those little places with benches up there but i got half way up and couldn't go farther because i'm afrain of heights. we came  back to our chairs and set down then in the same place. first one light came on then maybe 2 seconds later another light came on right beside the first one.  i think it was about 5 lights that came one at a time all beside each other.  i grabed his arm and he said, what should i do.  i screamed to go get somebody up.  i was really scared now.  he took off in the front door and the lights went off.  he brought my daughter out and of course she was groggy from being in a deep sleep.  the lights were out but she did hear the same thunder sound.   i am a 54 year old nurse who is very level headed.  my son-in-law and daughter are both professionals.  "m" is very, very intellegent and when he ask me what to do i knew he was as scared as i was.  it was the week after labor day and most all of the houses were vaccant.  season was over.  the bridge to the islad is short and its a pretty small island.  i didn't even know if there were police around or who to call.  it has changed my life.  every time i'm outside at night i am watching the sky.  the other day one of my patients came in and told me he saw an ufo over the weekend.  of course i was interested.  i told him about my incounter and he gave me this web site.  it makes me feel good to tell this and think somebody may actually believe me.  i'm not sure what county ocean isles is so i just guessed so i could submit.
content.summary: Saw something 3 different times.  lights only.  first time one light, second time one light, third time 5 lights

the pictures where taking at the carretera centra at 4880 meters over the sea level, and we see the object only in 4 of then.

content.detailedDescription: I reported seeing a white orb a few days before this event to mufon i was using a fake name and email but anyways i was really sick since the first sighting as a result i couldn���t go to school so i stayed home cuz my stomach was in horrible pain then only shortly after i went back to bed just before 8 am i woke up to see my door shut to the hallway which is always open and the light was on or there was something given light and i could see shadows of something that didn���t look very big walking back and forth i couldn���t hear them but i noticed my dog who was one the bed with me earlier was gone so i frighten walked to the door and opened it real fast thinking someone had broken in but as soon as i opened the door the light was gone and i didn���t see anything but i felt like there was people staring at me i tried to speak i wanted to maybe get it to talk but as soon as i tried to talk my throat tightened and i couldn���t so i started actually getting scared i shut the door then sat on my bed and watched the light return and counted what i thought was maybe 2 or 3 "beings" in my hallway but then i all i remember next it laying in my bed on top of the covers facing up toward the ceiling but i couldn���t move i tried to talk again but i couldn���t i was afraid to open my eyes so i never did i open it once but only could see my ceiling  but shadows around me moving so i shut them and i tried so hard to scream and yell but nothing would come out of my mouth then i woke up to my dog jumping on my bed  and noticing the door was shut and i was laying face down on the covers i thought maybe it was all a dream but it all seems so real and plus it was 1030 ish when i woke up if the door was shut how could my dog leave or even come back so it didn���t add up to me i really think they took my dog and might have taken me i don���t know but i know i havent been sick since i actually have felt great since and a few days later my mom had an experience when she woke up at 3 am in the same room and these lights we have in our closet fell off both at the same time and she said she smelt a really powerful  odor of like vinegar or vinegar like smell all in the within a week
content.summary: White orb followed by something in my house

content.detailedDescription: A few years ago, my daughter and i drove out to the country away from the lights, so we could get a good look at a comet. i think it was named kahootek(sic) and it was spectacular.  i looked around the sky and saw a moving star. "there's a satellite" i said.  my dughter looked but could not see it and went back to the comet. i continued to watch the satellite pass from the north to the south through the cup of the big dipper and then i saw another one following the first, then another and another. four in a row i shouted to my daughter. she came over and i pointed them out to her. while i was watching, the two in the rear made an instant right hand right angled turn and travelled west, with no loss of speed, while the other two continued south.  now that i am retired. i want to buy myself a telescope and some night vision goggles, which seem to be unveiling even more unusual objects in our night sky.  note to washington: hello!! we, the people, are ready for you to tell us what you really know.
content.summary: Four in a row

content.detailedDescription:
The month and date was approximately february. this not just a sighting....They are communicating with me at this very minute and have been since the above date. they are locked into my home and me via a signaling system. i cannot lose contact, no matter where i go. they have locked into my computer, dish network system, as well as my vehicle and my head. messages and talking are comming through in english in my left ear. they are reading my mind and they are reading this as i write as they can see through my eyes!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

this is not a joke and it's not funny. i need help right the hell now. if someone gets out here with the right equipment you will pick up the signal easily, the problem is that no one will believe me. i have emailed the governor of california several times thrugh www.Politicsol.Com, as well as several military bases includng the navy which is in coronado, california. i went to hanscom field which is in massachusett's and was sent away like i was a nut case! this is very embarrassing as i feel so alone. i have a 13 year old son that i have to try to work this signal around.......He wants his "same mom back". please contact the military immediately to have them validate my claim as it is the gods honest truth!!!!!

12 pine river road
center ossipee, n.H.
03814

603-539-4199

please act now.............They are communicating.....Not just sightings!!!!!
content.summary: Triangle, red light off of what looks like a star, also round silver one as well

content.detailedDescription:
my oldest two children and i were returning from a school oriented event on the evening of april 22, 2010. we just left a main road in town; west jackson ave., to another, lesser road: western hills, as a short cut towards my parents'and my own home just off old sardis road.
  we passed through a police roadblock that was checking drivers' licenses and driver sobriety a few minutes past 9:00pm. just shortly after leaving the checkpoint, on down the road out of sight of the roadblock, my oldest daughter, who was in the middle row seat in the back of the minivan, suddenly said in a breathy type voice:"oh my god! it'ssssss ... a spaceship! mom! a spaceship!"
  my teenage son, who was riding shotgun, was looking up on his side of the car and started to squeal: "it's huge! oh my god it's so big!"
  naturally, i am trying my best to look and see whatever it is that has got the kids so excited. all i saw was a flash of an orange light near the top of my windshield's passenger's side. i am all over the road trying to see this thing, my daughter in the back seat is starting to cry and getting a little hysterical. my son is twisting around in his seat so much to continue to see this thing, that i fleetingly wonder if he is going to give himself whiplash. he is also jumping up and down as much as the seatbelt will allow and also semi-hysterical. both are talking at the same time and i could not make out whole sentences. 
  at the same time i am trying to control the urge to keep looking for whatever it is in the sky, i am still traveling down a curvy road in the dark. so, i have to give up trying to see it and concentrate on where i am going. luckily, there is no traffic coming my direction.
  we enter part of the road where the trees block any sightline the children have, and when we emerge from it, the object was gone.
  when i get to the intersection of western hills and old sardis road, i pause to look back and see if we can catch any sight of the object. there is nothing. i try to rule out things by asking the children questions about the object. we are not far from oxford's airport, and i was almost positive the kids saw a plane banking to land at the airport. i realize that if it was a plane, i would have heard the sound since my window was still all the way down from going through the roadblock. the size of the object described and put in relation to a plane banking would have made it impossible to miss the sound of a plane's engines. 
  i ruled out hot air ballon, air plane, street lights, storm clouds, automobiles, ... you name it. also, note that in the amount of time from when my daughter saw the object first, to when i paused to look back where i had a good view of the tree line, was just a couple of minutes. any of those things i described except maybe a plane or automobile, would still be nearby, but there was nothing.
  after a couple more minutes looking around for anything to pop up, i started the van towards my parent's house to pick up my youngest daughter who was not feeling well enough to attend the event with us that evening.
  i have to admit, i was terribly creeped out by this event, but at the same time, incredibly jealous that the kids saw this thing and i didn't. we live in a very rural type neighborhood and the thought of driving home in the dark was a bit uncomfortable. this thought was echoed by my kids and another almost hysterical outburst was displayed by both. i explained to them i was sure that if they wanted us they had an excellent oppertunity to get us back there, and to not to worry about things they had no control over. this did not go over very well.....
  upon reaching my parent's house, my son and daughter ran inside and was telling my folks all about what they saw and trying to describe it. i stopped them and told them to each get a piece of paper, go into different rooms, and draw what they saw. ( i have added pics of the children's drawings) i did not since i really didn't see anything but maybe a flash of orange light. it wasn't very bright, but enough you would notice. the roof of the van blocked my sight.
  my parents were not very impressed, but somewhat supportive of at least the children's account of what was seen.
  on the drive home from my folk's, i advised the children to keep quiet about the sighting to friends at school. i also tried to calm my son down since he seemed to be having a hard time getting over being scared. of course, all of us had our eyes glued to the sky all the way home. 
  my husband was already asleep when we got home so we had to wait until the next day to get his opinion and input about the incident. 
  my husband ought to have "skeptic" as his middle name, and was kinda dismissive until i remembered the drawings. he didn't know what to say after that.

  i watched the papers and local news for weeks very closely for any mention of "lights in the sky". i wanted to call and ask if any police officers at the roadblock saw anything, but my father is a retired oxford police officer of 20+ years and i don't need that kind of grief.
  i wrote to a couple of "paranormal/ufo investigation groups, but did not get any answer. i came upon this site and now maybe, i can get some answers.
content.summary: Children see ufo at treetop level outside the car while going down the road

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i had just gotten off the 8:09 pm train from new york city to bay street in montclair. we were walking up glen ridge ave to where we had parked the car on cloverhill pl.

as we walked we noticed a very bright light in the sky to the south west. it was brighter, and larger than venus or any of the other bright planets would be, and looked very much like the headlight on a car hanging in the sky, or a landing light on a plane. i was looking at it wondering what it was when my wife commented "what is that?"  she never notices things in the sky, so that gives an indication on how odd it was.  i had been an amateur astronomer since i was a kid, so i can tell the various heavenly objects in the night sky quite easily. it was about three or four times the size of venus at its brightest. maybe about the size of a pea at arms length. 

all we could see of this object was a bright glaring light. it was not moving, made no sound, and had no other navigation lights. it was bright white in color, much whiter than the bright stars. i almost thought it was a comet, but it was too bright, and i hadn't heard of any comets that were due. it was at about 45���.

there were a few planes going by, as we live not far from ewr in newark. you could easily tell the planes, since they had red and green lights and the white strobe. this object stuck out like a sore thumb. it gave us the feeling that something unusual was happening, that's how out of place it was.  it made my wife uneasy.

we wanted to see if this object was truly stationary, so we stopped walking at the corner of glen ridge and cloverhill and stood still for about 30 seconds.  the object was totally motionless in the sky.  we could see a plane passing by farther away.

we turned the corner and walked to our car, and then proceeded up cloverhill in a ne direction and made a left turn on clairmont ave heading west.

when we got to the intersection of clairmont and grove, we could see that the object was still there in the same location. i joked that maybe we were seeing a new supernova!

the object remained in view the whole way as we drove up clairmont, and as we turned left on upper mountain ave and then right on bloomfield ave.  our driveway is halfway up that block. the ride took approximately 6-8 minutes. we had the object in the view the whole time. it remained stationary in the sky.

i went upstairs and grabbed my celestron skymaster 15x70 astronomical binoculars and headed back outside to get a better look at the object. i really didn't think it was a planet, but i would know for sure when i took a look. it was brighter than i had ever seen venus.

i got out to the front of our house and looked up to where the object had been, it should have been in the trees across the street, and didn't see anything. so i walked east on bloomfield ave to upper mountain so i would have an unobstructed view of the sky.  

at this point the object was nowhere to be seen.  it would have been very hard to miss, as it was the brightest object in the sky. i realized at that point that we were not looking at a planet or other astronomical object, since they don't just disappear, but we figured it wasn't anyway. something just didn't seem right about the object. i also had the feeling we were supposed to see it.

as a side note, this is not my first encounter with such things, as i have a history of unusual occurrences going back to about age 5.  in my teens myself and six other boys had seen what looked like a landed disk about 25 feet in diameter in orange nj, by the empty american radium corp building, and witnessed several 3-4 foot tall humanoids covered in shaggy black hair with large glowing green eyes.  they left cloven foot prints in the snow.  this was about 1970. i'm in my easily 50's now, and odd things continue to this day.
content.summary: Very bright light seen motionless in evening sky.

content.detailedDescription:
El evnto ocurri��������� en la localidad de algarrobo, sector costero a 1,30 horas de santiago de chile.
fu��������� a la hora de almuerzo, realic��������� la filmaci���������n con una camara fotogr���������fica digital de 3.1 mp, de video avi, sin sonido, en el momento que esprabamos por almorzar. debo dejar constancia, que no observ��������� nada en el momento sino al revisar el video una vez descargado en mi pc, tambien dejo constancia que el d���������a estaba totalmente nublado, debido a la estacionalidad clim���������tica de invierno, tambien no hab���������an luces encendidas en el interior de restaurant al momento de la filmaci���������n que pudiera reflectarse en los ventanales, ya que no hab���������a mucho p���������blico en ese horario.

content.detailedDescription:
Watching american idol when loud jet noise was heard directly over my house. ran outside to see quick moving aircraft heading south-southeast towards a bright shining light in the sky, almost like a satellite burning up in the atmosphere. within seconds the bright light disappeared and the military jet cut its engines. the jet headed towards the south. 
10 minutes later the jet returned. full afterburners on, i could see the red-hot cone of a jet engine, very distinctive, no other running lights. it banked s-sw and then cut it's engines once again.
soon after i saw something high in the sky, a string of red pulsing lights shaped in a v. moving slowly, no sound whatsoever. it lumbered overhead for several minutes before fading out of sight

i didn't see the jet or anything else that night. several hundred people called into the local sheriffs office to report it.
content.summary: Comet like star accompanied by military jet

content.detailedDescription: Looking at the eastern sky it was moving very fast downward toward the north it was bright solid white small from my view point. created about a 4 to 6" line in the sky then vanished.
content.summary: Looking east it was moving north.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were in the parks rc flying field.   i had just loaded up my rc planes to start home it was almost 8:00 pm.  we had been there almost an hour and a half.  that's when i saw a spere shaped object flying low to the ground.  i called my wife and after a few seconds she was able to see it.  from my point of view it was just over the power lines to our south aproximatly a mile form us.  the object was traveling from east to west.   it's speed looked to be faster that a small prop plane.  i't size similar to that of a ha baloon.  at first i thought it was a hot air baloon.  there was only a slight breeze at the time from the north.  the wind was so light that an hour earlier two hot air baloons in the south east stayed in the same spot for almost 30 min.  i looked at the object with a low power monocular but could not see any detail except that the sphere seemed to be flat on the bottom.  the object left our field of view when it appeared to turn to the south and went below the tree line.  this seems strange because the night before this sighting we reported a green fireball to mufon.  i still can not beleive my eyes and keep wandering if it was truly something unknown.
content.summary: Whitesh gray sphere low to ground

content.detailedDescription:
Well, from what i hear...
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=wm6um1jeujs

and as far as 'wtf is that?' i've seen a few 'unidentified' objects/crafs...
notice how i don't mention 'martian'...

i recently saw some odd shiny white blimp to rectangle thingamabob going s/w but up into the obrbit of space! sure enough space.Com? mentioned the shuttle tracking an object between it and the earth;

this was about 9am-1045, the duration so it was not a satelite; they go buy in shorter intervals? anyhow, it may look like a star at that point, i caught it late; but see the size in regards to plane?

i caught it just between a cloud bank, my friend could not see it 10plus miles north of here.
i think it tumbled at some point; shiny white thing. another person saw it when i lined it up to the ridge of the house; it was very s/w but at high angle, 1-2 oclock south?


if i only had the first sight, i thought it was a surveilance blimp/plastic rectangle on the edge of the atmosphere; 3-10 footballs fields length? craaaazy.

basically, at least get a nasa or sky tracking group so we don't have to wonder what the hell is looking over our shoulder while we're in our backyard; to suddenly look up and say hey, who installed the orbiting surveilance box!? it's a strange feeling. granted i realize around the same span of days the unmanned shuttle was just launched into operation, so, who knows!?
content.shape: Blimp,   Bullet,   Missile,   Cylinder,   Square,   Rectagular
content.summary: From sky to orbit, shining in sunrise rectangle/cylinder shape object

content.detailedDescription:
I found a small ufo sphere in "the 10 best fighter jets" (discovery channel) documentary film. the ufo flew near a u.S. air force f/a-22 raptor before ascending into the sky.

the ufo sphere can be seen at 2:32 minutes into the video (watch above the f/a-22 raptor's canopy):

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=jra00qq3oho

alfred r���sberg

http://realtvufos.Blogspot.Com/
content.summary: Small ufo found in "the 10 best fighter jets" documentary film

content.detailedDescription: Mid 80's dulce, nm my self a law enforcemnt officer w/jicarilla apache police. background police science/forensic western nm univ., silver city. had gone to graveyard shift at midnight w/ another officer and diapatcher. immediately went to a single females home with the other shift and was informed that a small being was in her house at the foot of the bed with a box shining a laser like red light at her, the other officers knowing it was there shift change left without further investigation. making fun mind you. she was obviously shaken up and i did notice some electrical malfunctions within her home and her animals, dogs and horses were uneasy. throughout the night i continued to check on her, once in the early morning i was called to her home, her house was dark and as i entered i could hear her down the hall crying for help. i was informed again of visitors with a light in her home and it seemed strangly quiet. no one to be found in the home or area. in the early morning when the sun comes up when their is light i drove up to the home to make a check i noticed some movement in the brush and trees just west of her home about 15 yards away. i still don't understand what i may have saw, but soon after as i was stepping out of my unit three oval craft in a triangular pattern about the size of a three bedroom home lifted off from behind some juniper trees just 30 yards at the most taking off silently without noise/down drafts, then turn a bright white light and slow went in the direction east towards chama.Nm slowly gain altitude. my other officer and dispatcher was witness to this also. shortly after i heard on the state police frequency from chama about those ufo.S that were being called in to them. i felt completely helpless as a officer to help someone who asked for help and was unable to assist and protect her in her time of need. it still bothers me today. s/gj. (i spoke with norio in dulce, nm during the dulce base conference also.)
content.summary: Visitation and ufo obseserved by law enforcement.

content.detailedDescription:
I live in an apartment right in front of the ocean in a summer resort city in miramar, buenos aires province in argentina.
it was approximately 10.15 p.M. when i took my dog for an usuall walk around the block. i noticed that a strong orange light was over the ocean horizon just a few feets to the left of my sight. it was winter time and it was very cold, there aren't too many people in the city on that season, it was on the 16th of may 2009, actually autumn in here, we say winter since there is very little activity after the summer season is over. suddenly i heard that a car was coming very slowly behind me on the street, and i feared i was going to be robbed, by that time i thought that the object was a ship with a strong light in it's cabin, when i turned to have a better view of the car, i saw inside of it a couple that was actually watching directly to the object, then i realized that that wasn't just a ship, and started to pay attention to the light wich started to move in zig zag towards us,and, when it reached the edge of the beach it made a fast fly, now towards my right sight side but very close to me, about half a block straight and another half block up. at that moment it was like blinking, and i could see some other colours like blue and red. i tried to see was was inside of that almost rectangular picture of about 20 by 30 feet, but it wasn't possible, i decided to turn on the corner and get even a better view, because i was right in front of the object, but i backed up a few steps, because i begun to fear, just a little, though i was fascinated with what i was watching. it wasn't until the(now i can call it u.F.O.) leaned towards it's right and down, that the object lighted up very intensibly and i saw the boomerang shape of it, and inmediately after, lots of bright light sparkles came up shinning all through, it was beautiful, it was like the best firework i ever saw and very fastly went up again to the left side of my sight but a little further up, like one and a half block high. i then looked at the couple in the car and wanted to have their opinion about all this, since the object was still up there, but the man, who was the driver, looked at me with a terrified face and very slowly left. since the unundentified object stayed up there right in front of the apartment building were i live, it took me a couple of minutes to decide to go back to it, wich i did, running with my dog to the side door, i stayed watching at the object, once in the lobby, but after 2 or 3 minutes it flew away at a very fast speed towards the sky and dissapeared.
ever since, i have talked about it with many people who believed me and others who didn't, but about 25 percent of them told me that they saw a very similar object, most of them a little further than i did. i have the feeling that this is going to happen again, i got retired, and have been studying about u.F.O's ever since, it's going to be one year since that happen and am constantly watching for if it happens again, i am prepared now, at that moment i didn't use my cell's camera i guess i couldn't think straight because of the emotion.
like i said, i live right in front of the ocean were many people saw objects, if i could be of any help, though i don't live in the states, i'd like to become an u.F.O. hunter, i am ready for any hipnosis, lie detector or whatever source or element could be used to prove that i am not lying.
sincerely
*(wit's name and phone numbers deleted--sgonzalez/cms).
the argentinian code precedes those numbers, i am not sure exactly wich one is, please find out for me wich one would be from there or contact me through my e mail, thank you
content.summary: Orange object seen on the ocean horizon came closer to the shore and flew up and stood still very close to me for a few minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
this is the third occasion that i and another person have witnessed these lights in the sky's over oak island ,nc. august of 09 i was fishing in the evening around 9:09 pm with my friend on a clear evening and just off shore there were five to six lights low in the sky pulsating different colors.They remained stationary for a long period of time making no noise then they would alternate blinking out and re-positioning themselves this happened for over three hours.We both noticed a jet come into view leaving a  u-turn contrail, the jet was apparently investigating the lights. one year later my wife was outside my home which is a few blocks from the beach and she said.... hey look over there there is a half dozen or so blinking lights just sitting there, they appeared to be in the same vicinity as the lights i previously saw and acted in the same manner. last evening mat fifth 2010 my wife was closing the blinds for the evening and joking said come here look outside there is a ufo.I went to the window and said nah that's just a star she said do stars blink different ant colors i said sure they twinkle if there is some sort of atmospheric disturbance? we went out onto the front deck and there it was over the same part of the beach as we have previously saw, at first i thought it was saturn because of how bright it was but spinning and blinking "bright blue-red over and over just sitting there stationary.We looked around and noticed there were five more two were side by side and the others in the two o'clock and four o'clock position all were glowing blue red you could see that with your naked eyes buy when you put up my nikon binoculars you could see them especially the one over the sea perfectly spinning glowing blue -red very bright!I drove over to the beach to get a good look at the spinning object to confirm that it was i had saw the previous year and it was the exact same thing just sitting there silently.I drove home which took about two minutes and looked again from my top deck and the one over the beach had moved over the island.Keep in mind now that over an hour had passed and the others were still just hovering in the sky. i am familiar with astronomy so i could watch the movement of the dipper and orian's belt the stars were in procession but these lights remained put. around 11:30 pm the object which had moved over the island rose up then moved left again and headed back to the beach area i could see it in the binoculars and the brilliant blue-red almost firecracker kind of lights, i saw it bank and was able to determine it was now not round and the lights were very bright. the objects remained in the sky until 2am then disappeared.

regards: marko
content.summary: Five rotating spheres stationary in the sky blinking blue-red.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work at 530 am, the sun wasn't up yet, not really any stars to be seen at the time. when i was about half way to work i looked out to my left and saw a stationary light (orangish-yellow) pretty high up and i kept driving while keeping my eye on the ball. it had no flashing lights like most worldly aircraft. i thought maybe it was a beacon light to signal planes of telephone wires or something along those lines but it was way to high up and nothing behind it. as i got closer to maybe see the shape a bit better, in a 10 second span it began to get smaller it appeared to be moving away from me in the same exact direction i was going. it shrank to about the size of a typical star then disappeared. i was a bit shocked after this happened i tried debunking it as soon as i saw it and recognized it to be nothing of earthly origin. unfortunately i wasn't able to get any photos my phone camera isn't close to good enough  .
content.summary: Yellowish orange ball of light

content.detailedDescription:
My sister n law and i were driving down i75-s/85-s at night approx 11:00 on a saturday night (april 17, 2010). we were approaching "spagetti junction" in atlanta, i was doing about 60 mph. i slowed down without my sister in law even noticing that slowed down (because i noticed this unusal (what i thought was a plane at first) moving towards the left. by the time i said "lisa" look is that a plane (at this point-i was right in far left lane nearly completely stopped on 75-which is a very busy expressway!). when she looked up the object was about 20-25 feet above the hov lane. she said to me : " no thats not a plane, omg. we started to scream, cuss everything above!!! this thing stayed in one place, had multiple lights bulbs underneath (at least 15-20) very bright. it looked like it was swaying back and forth.  now we also noticed that an actual plane which had already taken off from the airport (in the sky but miles away from this object), that only had about three lights and looked like a "bird".  at that point we quickly compared the two and the object we saw was not a plane. as i proceeded to move the car (because my sister in law said go go, they're are cars coming behing you). 

we noticed that it tilted a little upwards as if it was about to fly off, this is when we noticed that color of it was gray or steel and that it had a round dome at the top of it. in a blink of an eye the damn thing flew away so quick, we said where in the world did it go?  it actually was going in the same direction the plane that we saw, which was closer to the airport. (im sure that pilot saw that!!!

it was only a few feet high from the top road on spagetti junction/ hov lane. all of this was in about 3 minutes...By the way we both had our cell phones in our laps and was too shocked, that we didnt realize to take any pictures :( but wonderful experience!!
content.summary: Round, approx 15-20 lights underneath, gray color with dome.

content.detailedDescription:
Estaba en el balcon de mi casa, cuando vi un objeto estra���o que no se mov���a en ninguna direcci���n me pareci��� que era una cometa(de papel) pero cuando tome la primera foto vi que no lo era.
parece un avion pero me llamo mucho la atencion q no se movia, luego bajo unos metros verticalmente y desaparecio tras un edifico.
content.summary: Objeto extraño

content.detailedDescription: Girl friend seen bright light during daytime didnt tell me i noticed it at night and neighbor and i took pictures pictures came out shaped like a triangle from earth it looked like a cross with telescope it looked circle . watching it by tree tops as a station area to tell if it was moving and it would go out of sight and then come back the light would move at a slow than medium speed from earth it appeared to have two red lights on the cross ends but by scope they were not there the object looked round. 15 years ago i seen the same thing and reported it twice to the us coast guard i didnt know anyone else to report to because i didnt want people thing iam crazy but this time my girl friend susan and my neighbor steve that took the pictures seen the object so i have wittnesses .We were at home outside the bright light attracted me seen other stars around it the direction was west seen object 15 years ago i knew what it was lost sight because we went to bed object was seen may 4 5 and were waiting to see if we see it tonight may 6.
content.summary: Bright light moving around looked like cross from earth and round by telescope clear night seen for 2 nights working on 3.
